amendment.description: To prohibit the Federal Transit Administration from using funds appropriated under this Act to promulgate regulations to carry out section 5309 of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2857 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2857 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S11404-11405; text: CR S11405) To prohibit the Federal Transit Administration from using funds appropriated under this Act to promulgate regulations to carry out section 5309 of title 49, United States Code.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2857 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Dodd.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2857 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
